page.title: 03DOCTORS SURGERY, SOUTHWELL
page.content: The{surgery}in Southwell is situated on the Burgage Green,and was opened in 1973. Five{General Practitioners}look after about eleven thousand people within about a five mile radius between them. Each{doctor}has their own consulting room in which they see their patients. There is also a treatment room,a large waiting room,a clinic and a reception area. Each doctor is on call one night a week, and at week_ends a{locum}is sometimes used. Between them they have about one hundred appointments each morning and about seventy in the afternoon. The surgery is open from 8.30am_11am, 4pm_5.30pm and can deal with emergencies and minor surgery.The surgery also has monthly clinic for diebetics,a fortnightly clinic for breast disease & weekly child clinic.
